entry.title: Friday: Drizzle. High plus 3 except 7 inland.
entry.summary: Drizzle or flurries and freezing drizzle ending late this morning then clearing. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3 except 7 inland. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Friday 5 May 2023
